revision.text: ==English== ===Etymology=== {{suffix|en|xerox|er|id2=agent noun}} ===Noun=== {{en-noun}} # A [[xerox]] machine, or generically a term for a [[photocopier]]: #* '''1987''', ''The Samizdat bulletin, Issues 165-176'' #*: "I am sorry, but I would get rid of any '''xeroxer''' like this in our offices." "It is possible to read nevertheless," answered the First Lieutenant, embarrassed. # One who [[xerox]]es; a person who does [[photocopy]]ing. #* '''2009''', Ross Kilarney Doyle, ''Human Life in the 21st Century'' #*: It's also why I'm really delighted to have a wonderful helper like Dan, who's not only an accomplished '''xeroxer''' and stamp licker {{...}}
